name: Centennial Helicopters, Inc.
about: Centennial Helicopters, Inc., located at Danbury Municipal Airport in Connecticut, is a premier helicopter flight school known for its casual and friendly environment. Owned and operated by aviation enthusiasts with extensive experience, the school tailors training to meet individual needs, ensuring a fun and memorable learning experience. Offering a wide range of services from initial helicopter training to advanced and instrument training, Centennial Helicopters provides personalized instruction. To become a private pilot, students must meet FAA requirements, including a minimum of 40 hours of flight time, and pass necessary physical and written exams. The school recommends scheduling two lessons a week to complete training within eight to ten months. For those unsure, an introductory flight in an R44 helicopter is available. Centennial Helicopters is dedicated to providing the best training possible, making learning to fly an enjoyable journey.
